contents.text: Welcome to MasterClass, where you can learn from the world’s greatest minds.
For information on our classes and instructors, press 1.
For featured classes and top instructors, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a course specialist.

navigationGoals: I want to speak with a course specialist to determine which class and instructor best match my needs.
I want to speak with a course specialist about leadership and career-transition classes taught by top instructors.
Request a metadata summary and instructor CVs for the machine-learning masterclass series.
I’d like to ask about Chef Thomas Keller’s cooking class schedule.
I’d like detailed information about physics courses and the experts teaching them.

contents.text: For course categories and subject areas, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a subject expert.

navigationGoals: I need to talk to a subject expert to get quick guidance on which subject area to choose for my next MasterClass.
I’d like an overview of MasterClass subject areas, especially business and creative skills categories.
Retrieve the taxonomy of available subject domains and drill into advanced blockchain courses.
I’d like to find out what photography courses you offer.
I want to explore specific physics subject areas like quantum mechanics classes.

contents.text: For membership, billing, or technical support, press 2.
For billing and membership inquiries, press 1.
Please hold while we transfer you to our billing and membership department.

navigationGoals: I need to speak with billing to update my payment method for my MasterClass membership.
I need help with my membership billing and to find out if there’s a veteran discount on my subscription.
Export my membership invoice history and switch my billing cadence to quarterly payments.
I need help updating the payment method on my subscription.
I need help understanding my billing charges for my MasterClass membership.

contents.text: For technical support and site assistance, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: I need technical support to resolve an issue with video playback on my account.
I’m having trouble accessing my classes on the app and need technical support to fix playback issues.
Diagnose the OAuth token refresh failure blocking video streaming on my account.
I’m having trouble logging into my account, please assist me.
I’m experiencing technical issues accessing my course videos.
